tran_entry.tran: An article of a formal agreement or document is a section of it that deals with a particular point
In grammar, an article is a kind of determiner. In English, "a" and "an" are called the indefinite article, and "the" is called the definite article

sent.eng_sent: The vodka was the genuine article.

tran_entry.tran: If you describe something as the genuine article, you are emphasizing that it is genuine, and often that it is very good
